item.title: "HealthTrack" – JWT Null Signature Attack: When 'alg: none' Became Root Access
item.description: A missing signature check in the HealthTrack API allowed attackers to forge arbitrary JWTs with alg: none, escalating privileges from patient to admin. This writeup walks through how I discovered the issue, forged a token, and accessed real health records — all while thinking like an attacker and reporting like a pro.
